name: My Little Investigations
description: My Little Investigations is an episodic MLP:FiM-based fan video game developed by Equestrian Dreamers with gameplay quite similar to that appearing in the game Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth, although it the gameplay isn't completely copied feature-for-feature. In short, the game is split up into separate cases, each of which begins with a crime being committed, and each of which requires Twilight Sparkle to investigate, to talk to and confront various characters from the MLP:FiM universe, and to ultimately solve the puzzle and unravel the case. Currently there is only 1 case available and it is open source on GitHub.
